{"images":[{"width":854,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231213/20231213111122336231.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":854,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231213/2023121311112232270336.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【峄山碑89天】方建勋老师说过这字很难写，我想着我也快3个月，应该问题不大。一写果然……周末再好好练练。\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231212/2023121209480780099640.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4096,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231212/2023121209480749081206.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1080,"height":2400,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231212/2023121209480605815904.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【峄山碑88天】当发现自己的右弧线没有对称感叹“完蛋了”时，发现原贴竟然也不是完全对称的。此刻，不管是李斯、还是徐铉，我和他们奇妙地重合了，他们不再是遥远的古人。\n这个字的知识点非常多，包括单字章法、重心、结笔、连环发卡弯弧线……书法外的字形字义、简化方式也很有意思，《说文》里解释“虫也”，然后就真的在以观里搜到了一个“虫”形。感觉写好了这个字，《峄山碑》的难度攻克差不多就完成了。当然，我没写好。","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":3072,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121109280711356324.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2744,"height":3971,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121109280725352826.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【峄山碑87天】只要线质过关了，其实越复杂的字容错率越高","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230408/2023040804334213855765.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230408/2023040804334231678851.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230408/2023040804334273990739.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第39天】终于掌握了怎么收笔，兴奋得再写了一张朱液线条。这几天一直在揣摩“收笔是起笔的镜像动作”，前天开始偶尔可以一笔圆润地收笔，今天基本笔笔成功。\n我的理解，将笔尖比作脚趾，笔椎体部分与圆柱体的临界点毫是膝盖，圆柱体部分的毫是大腿。起笔的“跪笔”和“跪”的动作一样：先轻轻用脚趾定位，再用膝盖发力，大腿一起往下施力，最重要的点还是膝盖。\n反之，收笔时，笔要轻轻向上提（但不能完全失去弹性），临界点","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":3152,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230407/2023040709300045876766.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第38天】今天用厚毛边试了试，抖动会更明显","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3680,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230406/2023040609563099238411.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第37天】看了群里的讨论，才意识到我的手臂也习惯夹着身体，今天开始改。此外，学着老师握笔提高一点锻炼笔力。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230405/2023040509180212777815.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230405/2023040509181119560620.jpg","idx":0},{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230405/2023040509182076476825.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第36天】来一组红与黑。睡得饱饱的，下午画画，晚上吃火锅拉线。\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3850,"height":2309,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230320/2023032008414151071694.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第20天】最近没什么进展。接下来10天，重点练习保持线条宽度一致、与留白等宽，气息平稳。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":1940,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230319/2023031910291380276513.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3622,"height":2735,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230319/2023031910291385989026.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第19天】许久不练多宝塔，手生得厉害，都不敢用侧锋了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2387,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230318/2023031811450966954074.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2342,"height":2225,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230318/2023031811450960585802.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第18天】手冻僵了，今日消灭毛茬计划继续进行中","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2214,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230317/2023031708465287993697.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第17天】治毛燥不平，还得是慢。今天开始感受到慢的种种好处，物我两忘，写到纸的尽头时意犹未尽。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230316/2023031606514003287312.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第16天】今天没有特别满意的线条，不过整体还算匀称。黄昏之时，总想到“鸡栖于埘 牛羊下来”可能是因为猫在睡觉。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":1147,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230315/2023031510430993988706.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第15天】早出晚归太累了，纸也破了，今天就简单地感受一下手感吧","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2065,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230314/2023031408293910754951.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第十四日】老师推荐的述古开笔，这弹力感觉能把我支棱起来。正经说起来，容错率大大提升，微小抖动没那么现形了，但蓄水能力一般般，我画得长，偶尔得接两次。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2988,"height":3513,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230313/2023031304533687775483.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第十三天】喝了两杯绿茶竟然抖得厉害……也算是一种升级训练方法了。为了把每次剩下的墨用掉，开始学山水。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230312/2023031205221843840614.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第十二天】想到老师说划线练习是练心法，乾坤大挪移，瞬间有劲了很多。ps，全熟蜡染纸好难写，没什么阻力","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2601,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230311/2023031109543269296968.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第十一天】发现横着乍看还行，旋转90度看竖的就歪得厉害了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":1884,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230311/2023031112160030196412.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第十天】到家很晚了，练得也晚，逐渐觉得厉害的学姐学长不是那么遥不可及","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":3000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230309/2023030909423326265824.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第九天】终于摸到了一点线质的感觉，但笔不够润，收尾竟然连连翻车。此外，每次拉线条都好热。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2374,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230308/2023030811271662226574.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第八天】篆者，引也。写的时候默念这句话会好写，但今天状态还是太差了，不能想着工作。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3958,"height":1576,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230307/2023030709160080963082.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第七天】还是不够慢啊，从明天开始限量着写","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2390,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230306/2023030609573726145877.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第六天】被科目三直线行驶支配的恐惧回来了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2346,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230305/2023030510531613438976.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"越想平行越做不到……明天搞点骚操作试试","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3798,"height":2272,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230304/2023030402481054658157.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"练多了反而状态不佳，接口处也十分明显。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4000,"height":2583,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230303/2023030311044231957839.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天打开了群里的表格，看到大家遇到的问题，会心一笑。同时，开始纠正写字姿势——之前几乎趴在了纸上——现在站直了。肩背总算不痛，只剩一如既往的腰酸。也不再执着一笔接完，其实接得毫无痕迹不也是一种训练吗？比如现在我就接得很差。总之，这种看起来好像还没昨天好，但清楚自己进步了的感觉，还不错。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230302/202303021129100201803.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"挂起来问题更明显。\n看了两个打卡里的作业后，再看看第一天的横线，整个又躁又歪，今天好一点点了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3000,"height":4000,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230301/2023030109075183694769.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"有点上瘾啊，但因为想一笔写完所以蘸了很多墨洇纸了，明天注意。","hasMore":false}
